title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Cornish, New Hampshire
content:
Photo submitted by Peter Burghardt, “Books with a view! This little library is on top of Dingleton Hill in Cornish, NH.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here. […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Cornish, New Hampshire appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
